eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 01:49 PM ON SEP 18, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:51 PM SEP 19, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Silver Alert has been issued for Phoenix, AZ. The Phoenix Police is looking for Richard Ryan last seen on foot in the area of 11th Street and McDowell wearing black cargo pants, light grey shirt, blue slip on shoes and Army Ranger hat. If you have contact with this Silver Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
